member.name: M:Estat.Sdmxsource.Extension.Engine.CsvDataWriterEngine.Close(Org.Sdmxsource.Sdmx.Api.Model.IFooterMessage[])
member.summary:
Writes the footer message (if supported by the writer implementation), and then completes the XML document, closes off all the tags, closes any resources. NOTE It is very important to close off a completed DataWriterEngine, as this ensures any output is written to the given location, and any resources are closed. If this call is not made, the output document may be incomplete.
NOTE: If writing a footer is not supported, then the footer will be silently ignored
Close also validates that the last series key or group key has been completed.
Starts a dataset with the data conforming to the DSD
member.param: Optional. The dataflow can be provided to give extra information about the dataset.
The data structure is used to know the dimensionality of the data

Dataset header containing, amongst others, the dataset action, reporting dates, dimension at observation if null then the dimension at observation is assumed to be TIME_PERIOD and the dataset action is assumed to be INFORMATION
Any additional annotations that are attached to the dataset, can be null if no annotations exist

member.name: M:Estat.Sdmxsource.Extension.Engine.CsvDataWriterEngine.StartGroup(System.String,Org.Sdmxsource.Sdmx.Api.Model.Objects.Base.IAnnotation[])

If this method is not called, and a message requires a header, a default header will be generated.

member.name: M:Estat.Sdmxsource.Extension.Engine.CsvDataWriterEngine.WriteObservation(System.String,System.String,Org.Sdmxsource.Sdmx.Api.Model.Objects.Base.IAnnotation[])
member.summary: Writes an observation, the observation concept is assumed to be that which has been defined to be at the observation level (as declared in the start dataset method DatasetHeaderObject).
member.param: May be the observation time, or the cross section value
The observation value - can be numerical
Any additional annotations that are attached to the observation, can be null if no annotations exist

member.name: M:Estat.Sdmxsource.Extension.Engine.CsvDataWriterEngine.WriteObservation(System.String,System.String,System.String,Org.Sdmxsource.Sdmx.Api.Model.Objects.Base.IAnnotation[])
member.summary:
Writes an Observation value against the current series.
The current series is determined by the latest writeKeyValue call, If this is a cross sectional dataset, then the observation Concept is expected to be the cross sectional concept value - for example if this is cross sectional on Country the id may be "FR" If this is a time series dataset then the observation Concept is expected to be the observation time - for example 2006-12-12
Validates the following:
The observation Time string format is one of an allowed SDMX time format
The observation Time does not replicate a previously reported observation Time for the current series
member.param: the concept id for the observation, for example 'COUNTRY'. If this is a Time Series, then the id will be DimensionBean.TIME_DIMENSION_FIXED_ID.
may be the observation time, or the cross section value
The observation value - can be numerical
Any additional annotations that are attached to the observation, can be null if no annotations exist

member.name: M:Estat.Sdmxsource.Extension.Engine.CsvDataWriterEngine.WriteObservation(System.DateTime,System.String,Org.Sdmxsource.Sdmx.Api.Constants.TimeFormat,Org.Sdmxsource.Sdmx.Api.Model.Objects.Base.IAnnotation[])
member.summary: Writes the observation.
